name: topside-db
title: Topside DB
description: Search for anything in Arc Raiders and get instant information

commands.name: topside-db
commands.title: Topside DB
commands.description: Get information for anything in Arc Raiders
commands.subtitle: Search for anything in Arc Raiders and get instant information

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
